commands.watch: Starts playing the selected anime via mpv
commands.link: Displays direct links to anime episodes

--version.info: Displays the current version of the program

--episode.info: Defines the anime episode for the command

--language.info: Defines the audio language for the anime

--genre.info: Defines the genre for the anime search filters

--season.info: Defines the season for the anime search filters

--year.info: Defines the year for the anime search filters

--category.info: Defines the category for the anime search filters

--status.info: Defines the season for the anime search filters

--studio.info: Defines the studio for the anime search filters

--dub.info: Defines the dubbing for the anime search filters

--sort.info: Defines the sorting for the anime search filters

--threads.info: Number of threads to use for download

--out-dir.info: The directory where the file(s) will be downloaded

--filename.info: Name of the file containing the downloaded anime video (must contain extension)

--all.info: Selects all of the anime's episodes for watching or downloading. Useful for watching multiple episodes without interruption.
